hanzi-su-wiki:
砕

Значения

Разбивать, упрощать, делать понятнее; разбиваться, быть приветливым

Мнемоника

Справа — цифры девять 九 и десять 十, т.е. «много». Разбивать камень 石 на множество кусков.

Варианты

碎
purpleculture_pinyin:
suì
variant of 碎
вариант сломанной
rtega_mnemonic:
砕砕RS
碎碎		break, smash, broken, busted
  • soldiers 卒/卆 smashing things with stones 石
heisig_constituent: smash, stone, rock, ninety, nine, baseball, ten, needle
heisig_story: We begin with the two elements on the right, baseball and needle. Since they will be coming together from time to time, let us give the two of them the sense of a game of cricket in which a needle is laid across the wicket. Then imagine using a rock for a ball. A smash hit would probably splinter the bat in all directions, and a smashing pitch would do the same with the needle wicket.
koohiiStory1: To SMASH a STONE you need to hit it NINE or TEN times.
koohiiStory2: The Stones (the Rolling Stones) are 90 aged but they´ve done a new SMASH hit!
jp_example_words:
砕く(くだく): break, smash
砕ける(くだける): break, be broken
jp_readingExamples: 砕く (くだ.く), 砕ける (くだ.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Take this stone and throw it at nine crosses to smash them! It's like old-fashioned bowling, but instead of rolling this stone to knock down the crosses, you want to completely smash them to bits!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the nine crosses in front of you, lined up in a triangle. Now take your rock, hold it above your head, and SMASH it down on them as hard as you can!!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you smash these crosses, you think of your cyborg (さい) and how much you want to smash the people who took it away from you. Your cyborg was so good at smashing things too. You could be smashing together, if you didn't have to sell it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You smash things because your own heart has been smashed by your cyborg. :'(
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 十 (десять), 九 (девять), 口 (рот), 石 (камень)
Ru_trainchinese: suì: (глаг/прил) (устар.) ломаться, разбиваться; сломанный, битый
Kanshudo_mnemonic: nine out of ten (卆) stones (石) could smash anything

Name meaning

suì
яп. вм. 碎
Radicals: 石, 九, 十  (stone, nine, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
Take this stone and throw it at nine crosses to smash them! It's like old-fashioned bowling, but instead of rolling this stone to knock down the crosses, you want to completely smash them to bits!
Picture the nine crosses in front of you, lined up in a triangle. Now take your rock, hold it above your head, and SMASH it down on them as hard as you can!!
Reading Mnemonic
As you smash these crosses, you think of your cyborg (さい) and how much you want to smash the people who took it away from you. Your cyborg was so good at smashing things too. You could be smashing together, if you didn't have to sell it.
You smash things because your own heart has been smashed by your cyborg. :'(
